input.sentences: my sister and i did it up big for benji 's birthday last week .
first | we went to a hot pot restaurant | his favorite | and had a big meal .
then | we went to a mini race car facility and let him drive the car .
you know how much benji loves race cars -- -he had a great time .
we all went on the amusement park ride at the facility . i was scared | but benji loved it !
output.sentences: This week was my sisters birthday.
We went to the melting pot for our meal.
We got to race this car in the mini facility.
We love to race so we had a great time.
We even went on a scary ride.
